original_text: He built fortified cities in Judah, for the land had rest. He had no war in those years, for the Lord gave him peace.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아사에게 평안을 주셨으므로 그 땅이 평안하여 여러 해 싸움이 없은지라 그가 견고한 성읍들을 유다에 건축하니라

sentences.original_text: He built fortified cities in Judah
He had no war in those years
for the Lord gave him peace.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 그에게 평강을 주셨기 때문입니다.
